body: Bisecting this. The lack of POM on the cube repros even as far back as Sep 13. So that at least isn't a recent regression.

Note: Lack of parallax on the cube in `forward + prepass` was in the initial creation of this scene. `Forward + prepass` has never supported parallax mapping. (Not to be confused with the current issue with parallax on the cube in forward on current main)
Yes, but it's also broken in pure forward now (there's some weird ghosting ðŸ™ƒ)

The culprit for the loss of normal mapping is the retained render world, #15320.

Note that deferred was broken at the time that commit landed (due to PCSS) and wasn't fixed until #15656, which is ddd4b4daf8bb3df1dac0fd5f453269ff4bd4f99a. So you'll want to `git cherry-pick ddd4b4daf8bb3df1dac0fd5f453269ff4bd4f99a` if you check out that commit.

one of the issues being described here is the shadow being retained when changing from Deferred or Forward + Prepass into Forward, right?

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/08c4461b-2018-4f37-96ce-c08e2eed4cd5)

taken using 85eceb022da0326b47ac2b0d9202c9c9f01835bb

things got worse on 7aeb1c51a6e6e8ec6d0ff659f90a38e848884b94

git bisect done
`dda97880c48ff39c3a77ff2eb398c34b382cb771 is the first bad commit`

issue.title: Remove prepasses from the render world when they're removed from the main world.

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
This makes switching rendering modes in `deferred_rendering` work again.

Closes #16679.

body: The root of the problem is that we add prepasses to the render world views but don't remove them. #17565 fixes that but can't be merged yet because it exposes other bugs.

issue.title: Add scenes similar to `deferred_rendering` to 3d testbed

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: A-Build-System
labels.description: Related to build systems or continuous integration

labels.name: S-Blocked
labels.description: This cannot move forward until something else changes

labels.name: C-Testing
labels.description: A change that impacts how we test Bevy or how users test their apps

labels.name: X-Contentious
labels.description: There are nontrivial implications that should be thought through

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
# Objective

The `deferred_rendering` example is frequently broken, adding it to the testbed will warn PRs that break it.

## Solution

Add scenes similar to `deferred_rendering` to 3d testbed

## Testing

`cargo run --example testbed_3d --features="bevy_ci_testing"`

## Showcase

Screenshots for the new scenes
Forward
![screenshot-Forward](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ea605bf7-999d-453f-bda6-0aea61aa0398)

ForwardPrepass
![screenshot-ForwardPrepass](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c4c9e5f9-e190-4da1-b5c3-f17ab83ac46b)

Deferred
![screenshot-Deferred](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e543a52d-5aec-4e68-bc22-081027d6c6a8)

 ## TODO
- [x] Merge conflicts
- [ ] Limit CI
